channel.title: Services on Clinical Research Facility - Cork || Statistics and Data Analysis Unit
channel.description: Recent content in Services on Clinical Research Facility - Cork || Statistics and Data Analysis Unit

item.title: Education
item.description: We regularly offer workshops in the areas of statistics, data, and coding using the R programming language for statistical computing. Please see our schedule of upcoming events here, as well as the Cork R-Users group. We can also deliver bespoke workshops for your research group. Click here for more info.

item.title: Fee-based services
item.description: We also offer fee-based support for existing studies. Specific areas include study design and protocol development, statistical analysis plans, sample size estimation, statistical modelling, and reporting. Click here for more info.

item.title: Grants
item.description: SDAU statisticians are available to support grant applications as collaborators or co-investigators. Click here for more info.
